TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReadOnlySpan`1<T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> public value class ReadOnlySpan

span.span: The type of items in the .

summary.span: 提供任意記憶體之連續區域的型別安全和記憶體安全唯讀表示。

span.span: Provides a type-safe and memory-safe read-only representation of a contiguous region of arbitrary memory.

remarks.format: `ReadOnlySpan` 已[ref struct](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types)配置堆疊上，可以永遠不會逸出至受控堆積。`ReadOnlySpan` is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types) that is allocated on the stack and can never escape to the managed heap. Ref 結構類型有一些限制，以確保它們無法提升至受控堆積，包括，它們無法 box 處理，擷取在 lambda 運算式中，指派給變數的型別、 指派給`dynamic`變數，並不能實作任何介面類型。Ref struct types have a number of restrictions to ensure that they cannot be promoted to the managed heap, including that they can't be boxed, captured in lambda expressions, assigned to variables of type , assigned to `dynamic` variables, and they cannot implement any interface type. A`ReadOnlySpan`執行個體通常會用來參考陣列的元素或陣列的一部分。A `ReadOnlySpan` instance is often used to reference the elements of an array or a portion of an array. 不同於陣列，不過，`ReadOnlySpan`執行個體可以指向受管理的記憶體，原生記憶體，或在受管理的記憶體堆疊。Unlike an array, however, a `ReadOnlySpan` instance can point to managed memory, native memory, or memory managed on the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T[] ToArray() cil managed

summary.span: 將這個唯讀範圍的內容複製到新的陣列。

span.span: Copies the contents of this read-only span into a new array.

returns.span: 陣列，其中包含目前範圍中的資料。

span.span: An array containing the data in the current span.

remarks.format: 這個方法會執行堆積配置和資料複製，並因此，應該儘可能避免。This method performs a heap allocation and data copy, and therefore, should be avoided if possible. 它所支援的 Api 時，有時必須不可以使用，但會使用陣列的 Api。It it sometimes necessary when APIs that support are not available, but APIs that work with arrays are.

remarks.format: 針對`ReadOnlySpan`，則`ToString`方法會傳回包含指向範圍的字元。For a `ReadOnlySpan`, the `ToString` method returns a that contains the characters pointed to by the span. 否則，它會傳回型別和範圍所包含的項目數的名稱。Otherwise, it returns a with the name of the type and the number of elements that the span contains.

summary.span: 嘗試將此 的內容複製到 並傳回指出作業是否成功的值。

span.span: if the copy operation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: 如果`source`並`destination`重疊，在整個`source`一樣將它複製到暫存位置複製到之前處理`destination`。If the `source` and `destination` overlap, the entirety of `source` is handled as if it was copied to a temporary location before it is copied to `destination`. 如果`destination`長度小於`source`會複製任何項目，則方法會傳回`false`。If the `destination` length is shorter than `source`, no items are copied and the method returns `false`.
